Class ItemItemGlobalScorer

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GlobalItemScorer

    public class ItemItemGlobalScorer
extends AbstractGlobalItemScorer

    Score items based on the basket of items using an item-item CF model.

      • globalScore

        public void globalScore(@Nonnull
               java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> queryItems,
               @Nonnull
               MutableSparseVector output)
        Description copied from interface: GlobalItemScorer

        Score items in a vector based on a collection of items (a shopping basket).

        Parameters:
        queryItems - The items to use as the query.
        output - A vector whose key domain is the items to score.
        See Also:
        ItemScorer.score(long, MutableSparseVector)
